title: Where can I find someone who can read my statement of purpose? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can look on Fiverr for people who can read over your personal statement for grammar and/or sentence structure and/or re-write your statement. Different people specialize in different topics and many can show you examples of statements that have been successfully used in the past. I help people write their law school personal statements at my website here: https://lawschoolentryacademy.ca/services/editing/ Best of luck in your future :)
For whom did you write a statement of purpose? Or for what reason specifically? Show your statement of purpose, and I am sure that many people will read it.
